size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)
size.description_zh: 以 CSS 单位为单位的大小，包括单位名称或标准大小名称 （xs|sm|md|lg|xl）

tag.desc: HTML tag to render, unless no icon is supplied or it's an svg icon

color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: Color name for the label from the Quasar Color Palette; Overrides the 'color' prop; The difference from 'color' prop is that the label will always have this color, even when field is not focused
color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

left.description: Useful if icon is on the left side of something: applies a standard margin on the right side of Icon
left.description_zh: 如果图标位于某物的左侧，则很有用：在 Icon 的右侧应用标准边距

right.description: Useful if icon is on the right side of something: applies a standard margin on the left side of Icon
right.description_zh: 如果 icon 位于某物的右侧，则很有用：在 Icon 的左侧应用标准边距
